turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu zor matematik problemini bilmesem, öğretmene sorarım.
english_example_sentence: If I don't know this difficult math problem, I ask the teacher.
russian_example_sentence: Если я не знаю эту сложную математическую задачу, я спрашиваю учителя.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu zor matematik problemini ______, öğretmene sorarım.
